data.text: @kenkenkenken99 @ZoeTheReturn @katielhumphrys @samstreetwrites It depends where you go quite honestly
@kenkenkenken99 @katielhumphrys @UKTwinds @samstreetwrites Plenty don’t need either. They’re who are getting my money this year
@ZoeTheReturn @katielhumphrys @UKTwinds @samstreetwrites Isn’t that the difference between which countries require a test (pcr) vs those who accept NHS cert of recovery? @UKTwinds can you help?
@kenkenkenken99 @katielhumphrys @UKTwinds @samstreetwrites I did that and it didn’t work for travel. Needs to be a PCR. Tried it on Sunday when I was drunk 😂
@ArsenalFan4L1fe @katielhumphrys @UKTwinds @samstreetwrites That’s why I booked Norway and Costa Rica. No tests needed.
@katielhumphrys @ZoeTheReturn @UKTwinds @samstreetwrites You don’t need Covid to get a pass. You can now register your own LFT on the NHS website.
@ZoeTheReturn @katielhumphrys @UKTwinds @samstreetwrites Yes very true, however if you need a holiday as many of us do, it’s a good option rather than actually having Covid ☺️
@ArsenalFan4L1fe @katielhumphrys @UKTwinds @samstreetwrites But the whole buying tests, faking them etc is defeating the object. We need Spain to sort it out.
